Texts.Eng: Now it's time to maximize your output. Build an ^orange;Industrial Centrifuge^reset;. You'll need to find some ^orange;sand^reset; to make the glass you need. Try a desert!

Texts.Chs: 与蜂蜜灌装机一起配对，你将会得到成吨的蜂蜜。不过别忘记了，这个设备需要电力才能运转。
Texts.Eng: Paired together with a Honey Jarrer, you'll get tons of honey. I should mention that this station requires power to run, which you can get from an Alternator or better power source.
